header.name: Jayanthbharadwaj M
header.title: Full Stack Developer
header.description: Experienced developer with over 5 years of expertise in Full Stack development.

data.title: Techinical Lead
data.subtitle: Truminds software systems
tasks: Led a project named Migration Service, responsible for creating required AWS resources and facilitating migration between accounts.
Developed the backend for a Dashboard Project featuring dynamic API, where logic execution is based on JSON stored in the database.

data.title: Senior Developement Engineer-2
data.subtitle: Truminds software systems
tasks: Led frontend development efforts for a dashboard project involving rendering multiple camera feeds, maps, and other visualizations.
Contributed to an Identity and Access Management (IAM) project based on AWS Cognito, enhancing authentication and authorization functionalities.
Implemented various services in TruIAM such as Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), WebAuthn, social login, and passwordless authentication.
Acquired hands-on experience with multiple AWS services including Cognito, Lambda functions, S3, CloudFront, Secret Manager, API Gateway, Route 53, and CloudWatch.

data.title: Associate Software Engineer
data.subtitle: Brigosha Technologies
tasks: Served as a backend developer for the Edtech platform 'Aulas'.
Developed user management functionalities, including registration, creation, and updating of user profiles.
Implemented fee management features, enabling the creation of fee links and seamless payment acceptance via Cashfree integration.
Designed communication services for sending SMS and email notifications to users.

data.title: Product Developer
data.subtitle: Camp Automation
tasks: Developed web applications utilizing PHP, Node.js, and React.
Designed and executed mobile applications employing React Native.
Administered database users and databases to guarantee operational efficiency and data integrity.

data.title: Intern
data.subtitle: Augplat Technologies
tasks: Assisted with database maintenance tasks and contributed to the development of new dashboards.
Participated in various web application development projects, providing support and contributing to project deliverables.

data.title: Stothram
data.subtitle: Community Mobile App Developed in React Native
tasks: Developed a mobile application using React Native for the community.
Published the application on the Google Play Store for easy access.
Created a Progressive Web App (PWA) using React.js, accessible at: https://jayanthbm.github.io/stothram-ios/
Implemented a JSON parser using React.js to dynamically render data in the application.
Hosted the JSON parser on GitHub, accessible at: https://jayanthbm.github.io/stothram-parser/

data.title: Trivia Bot
data.subtitle: Python-based Trivia Bot
tasks: Developed a Python bot to capture and analyze screenshots at specific coordinates.
Utilized the Google Vision API and Tesseract to extract text from screenshots.
Implemented a Google query mechanism to search for the question online.
Analyzed search results and provided rankings for potential answers.
Predicted the correct answer based on ranking and relevance.
